name: php
readme:
PHP is compiled with default extensions. If you would like to use non-default extensions you can use the following (nix) syntax in place of `php` in devbox.json:

(php.withExtensions ({ enabled, all }: enabled ++ (with all; [ ext1 ext2 ])))

For example, adding memcached and ds to php81 looks like:

(php81.withExtensions ({ enabled, all }: enabled ++ (with all; [ memcached ds ])))
